name: Call of Last Sniper
description:
Play the call of sniper as one of the best FPS commando shooting game in the modern shooting arena. As a front line shooter, you are at heavy counter fire zone. Feel the real thrill of sniper shooting simulation while killing the enemy elite shooters and show your best headshots killer skills. Be a silent killer spy commando shooter and don’t waste your ammo by missing the kill shots or else you run out of ammunition. The silent shooter game is an ultimate addition to the sniper shooting games. It is one of the best commando shooting game of the 3D shooting simulation world. The game is based on realistic sniper shooting missions. You are at the enemy base camp and your mission is to shot down all the enemy soldiers by performing excellent head shots. As a member of commando elite force, you are fighting on the front line with your extreme shooting skills and using the perfect gun shots. Perform the silent sniper strikes and be accurate while aiming down the enemy assassins and don’t let your enemy run.

Perform the best 3D shooting action while playing the call of sniper game. Enjoy the real thrill of the best commando game and forget all other commando shooting games. The 3D FPS game is full of most realistic sniper shooting in the modern combat shooting arena. Take your position on the rooftops and watchtowers to kill the enemy sniper shooters. The enemy elite shooters are very perfect in silent killer headshots, so keep your head low. It is the most addictive shooting simulation so far in the category of commando shooting simulator games. So play the most difficult commando survival mission in the extreme warzone and show your best gorilla commando skills to survive in enemy territory and perform the best sniper headshots. The enemy base camp is full of SSG force and their elite force commandos have hawk eye. So the more you are accurate in killer shots, the more you have chances to win this commando game.

Call of sniper is basically a spy commando mission to disable the base camp security to eliminate the enemy soldiers. As a front line elite shooter, your first objective is to disable the watchtower defense by killing the enemy snipers. Then use your machines guns and sniper rifles to kill all other enemy assassins which are continuously guarding the base camp. You are on special duty as a special secret agent of SSG force, so be brave while playing the thrilling commando shooting simulation game. Use your special gorilla commando skills to survive in the desert sniper strike field and keep killing the enemies until you are done. The ammo is limited so perform the perfect head shots and don’t miss a single gun shoot and be perfect commando spy and silent killer. 
Top features of Call of Sniper:
• Beautiful and marvelous high quality graphics.
• Amazing collection of real assault weapons.
• Extreme and heavy counter fires.
• User friendly controls and excellent GUI.
• Realistic gun shots sounds and music.

How to Play:
• Swipe the device screen to aim down the target.
• Tap the telescope button to get the clear view.
• Use the controller sensitivity button to play smoothly.
• New weapons and updated health kit and bullet store.
